oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Krystal restaurant coffee advertisement, undated
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Continental Film Productions Corporation
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Color photograph of a full mug of Krystal coffee and a sign. The sign in the image reads, "WE TRY TO SERVE The BEST COFFEE IN TOWN; MAKE US PROVE IT."
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Advertising photography; Fast food restaurant
The Krystal Company
